original: @136b 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs /
analyzed: @136b 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs /
translated: The Dhāraṇī of the Eight Thousand Verses of the Noble Perfection of Wisdom

original: bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo; ;tadya th'a /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo; ;tadya th'a /
translated: Homage to the Blessed Mother, the Perfection of Wisdom!🔽Tadyathā:

original: aom hri: shru ti smri ti bi dza ye sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom hri: shru ti smri ti bi dza ye sv'ah'a /

original: pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a yee /
analyzed: pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a yee /

original: sarba durga ti shva dha ya /
analyzed: sarba durga ti shva dha ya /

original: 'di gzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di gzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By upholding this, the Eight Thousand Verses of the Perfection of Wisdom will be upheld.

original: ltas ngan pa sna tshogs kyang bzlog go /
analyzed: ltas ngan pa sna tshogs kyang bzlog go /
translated: It will also avert various inauspicious events.

original: las kyi sgrib pa dang / ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las kyi sgrib pa dang / ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It will purify all karmic obscurations and lower realms.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The Dhāraṇī of the Noble Eight Thousand Verses of the Perfection of Wisdom is complete.
